title: game freezes
body:
ok I don't know what is going on, but today 3 times in a row in 3 games I had freeze, I could move cursor and could hear background music and that's it, I coildnt even press alt+tab to exit, I had to ctrl+alt+del to sing out from pc.
I did check my drivers which are up to date, I did make repair client , and that did not help.{{item:3151}}

replies.body:
This is a problem that they are aware of, it started Tuesday with the patch.  Apparently they are working on fixing it, but since they haven't made any sort of public announcement who knows what the deal is.  
I was in contact with a Riot Support member that said they are getting a lot of reports about the problem and are looking into it
Many ppl have this problem (me too), seems they dont care.

Hi guys, if you run into this problem it would really help us out if you can follow these instructions and provide us with some information to debug the issue:

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/1yUAdeKV-in-game-freezing?show=flat&comment=003e

<3

I've tried the Hextech repair + reinstall, the latter failed to work so I manually uninstalled/reinstalled the game.

What kind of CPU+GPU do you have?
